{{引自其他wiki|维基百科|中日文同名页面}}
'''''Onmyouji'''''(Japanese or Traditional Chinese:陰陽師), or ''Yinyangshi'' in Chinese, is a Japanese style card game.<ref>{{Cite web|url=https://m.sohu.com/n/468082097/?wscrid=95360_3|title=网易和风匠心巨制 《阴阳师》手游今日全平台公测-新闻频道-手机搜狐|accessdate=2016-10-28|author=|date=|publisher=搜狐网}}</ref><ref>{{Cite web|url=http://culture.dwnews.com/news/2016-10-26/59777795.html|title=手游《阴阳师》爆红 拷问中国文化输出_天下|accessdate=2016-10-28|author=|date=|publisher=多维新闻网}}</ref>

The game is developed by NetEase Games. The Japanese style is rare in Chinese mobile game. Additionally, the game invited(English grammar?) a number of Japanese popular CV for story dialog and transitions (subbed in Chinese in Chinese version [Eng ver?]). Asian well-known film musician Shigeru Umebayashi, who had the film "Onmyouji" soundtrack, has the game soundtrack.

The game was launched in September 2, 2016 in the App Store mainland China, September 9 in mainland China, the whole platform beta.<ref>{{Cite web|url=http://yys.163.com/news/official/2016/08/25/22592_638278.html|title=超高人气引爆预约，《阴阳师》公测时间首次曝光|accessdate=2016-08-23|author=|date=|publisher=《阴阳师》手游官网}}</ref>In Japan, service started on February 23, 2017.

On the setting of the Heian period, Ayumi Himeaki, an undocumented Onmyouji, led the shikigami to fight against the chimimoryo.
